entry.title: Easy Build & Test Deployments with App Center
entry.summary: JeffGuKang shared how to use MS's AppCenter while developing various apps with React Native. It's mainly about building and deploying tests that you have to do iteratively.
entry.content:
JeffGuKang shared how to use MS's AppCenter while developing various apps with React Native. It's mainly about building and deploying tests that you have to do iteratively.

https://youtu.be/SyN7nYejzSo

entry.title: Kakao Login Module Web Support
entry.summary: This is the content of the React Native Seoul meetup on August 31st. KnewKnew front-end developer, Namkyu Kyu shared the process of contributing the web feature to the React Native Kakao Login open source, the problems he encountered, and how he solved them.
entry.content:
This is the content of the React Native Seoul meetup on August 31st. KnewKnew front-end developer, Namkyu Kyu shared the process of contributing the web feature to the React Native Kakao Login open source, the problems he encountered, and how he solved them.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DZypUEUWth0

Related PR‚Äã

  • https://github.com/react-native-seoul/react-native-kakao-login/pull/319
  • https://github.com/react-native-seoul/react-native-kakao-login/pull/322
  • https://github.com/react-native-seoul/react-native-kakao-login/pull/329

entry.title: Greetings
entry.summary: Hello. This is Hyo, the organizer of React Native Seoul.
entry.content:
Hello. This is Hyo, the organizer of React Native Seoul. The community operation was not smooth for a long time as the event could not be held in Coupang after COVID. In order to revitalize the community culture again, a new homepage has been opened.

Going forward, we will continue to share new news through our website and ensure smooth operation.
